title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 20 ยง 488.6 - Criminal penalties and other offenses
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 20 ยง 488.6 - Criminal penalties and other offenses

State Regulations

Tax Law, ยง 512(4)

For criminal penalties and other offenses see article 37
of the Tax Law. Such penalties and offenses are in addition to any civil
penalties described in this Part and any applicable penalties provided for in
the Penal Law or elsewhere. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 20
ยง
488.6

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
